question: 渋谷
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>bitter</kanji> <kanji>valley</kanji> is a place known as <vocabulary>Shibuya</vocabulary>. This is a very famous area in Tokyo. Very busy too.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading of <ja>渋</ja> comes from <ja>渋い</ja>. The reading for <ja>谷</ja> is an exception. Just think about someone asking you if  <vocabulary>Shibuya</vocabulary> is cool. Your answer of course is "<reading>yah</reading>." (<ja>や</ja>)
